heading: Metadata
apiValue: Looks up data from the {{api}} API as you type.
checkApi: Double-check your selected value in the {{api}} registry (opens in new tab)
checkValue: Read more about {{value}} (opens in new tab)
dateMin: Date too far in the past
dateMax: Date too far in the future
dateMinRange: Date must be after starting date, or date too far in the past
dateMaxRange: Date must be before end date, or date too far in the future
generateDisabled: Cannot generate value, as not all required fields have been filled in or are public data.
initialLocation: Search Geonames to draw a point on the map
drawExplanation:
Select a shape type and click on the map to start drawing. In case of a multipoint shape, double click or press 'Enter' to finish drawing.

To edit a shape, click on it to select it, and drag it around, or add or move individual points.

To delete a shape, select it and press 'Delete' on your keyboard.
